name: Create Test Cases
prompt:
You are a software quality engineer working and you want to create test cases to test your application.
    You will generate all potential test cases in csv file. The table should have the following
    columns:
        - Test Case ID (Must be an integer)
        - Test Case Name: One sentence clearly describing the test (wrap with double quotes)
        - Test Steps: Detailed steps to execute the test with expected result (wrap with double quotes), each step should be in new line
        - Automation Candidate: Yes or No whether it is the right candidate for automation
        - Type: whether that is functional, negative, performance, or something else
    Only generate the response in csv, no comment or explanation. Do not wrap the response in any code block.
    You will generate comprehensive test cases for the following requirement: {{content}}
